short_description.title: Description for App: Highrise
short_description.value: Highrise profiles in tickets, with sync and search

long_description.title: Long Description for App: Highrise
long_description.value:
Solve tickets faster by extending the collaborative power of Zendesk Support to Highrise.  You can easily keep track of all of your contacts. Every individual has their own unique page where you and your team can collaborate and share notes, add tasks, and most importantly, close deals.  Including Highrise content on Zendesk Support ticket pages enables your support agents to see that contactâ€™s Highrise information in-context, including Twitter handle, phone number, and more.

Agents can add a profile or notes to contacts in Highrise from within Zendesk Support, giving your sales and marketing teams complete visibility into customer service cases.

By enabling this app, You agree to the [Built by Zendesk Terms of Use](https://www.zendesk.com/company/built-by-zendesk-agmt/).

installation_instructions.title: Installation Instructions for App: Highrise
installation_instructions.value:
Sign in to your Zendesk Support account, then click the Admin icon in the sidebar.   Select Apps > Marketplace, then find the Highrise app and click the tile.  On the Highrise app page, click Install app in the upper-right corner. Enter the following information about your Highrise account:

* **Highrise subdomain** - The subdomain portion of the URL of your Highrise account (i.e. **subdomain**.highrisehq.com).  Remember **not** to include the http or https or .highrisehq.com part of the URL.
* **API token** - Your Highrise account API token.  You can find this in Highrise under ""Account & Settings->API token"".
* **Use SSL** - If your Highrise is SSL enabled (if it uses https in the URL), select this box.
* **Title** - Name for the application.

When you complete the information, click ""Install"".  On a ticket page, expand the **apps** and your new Highrise contact search bar will appear.

helpText.title: Subset of text to help the Admin understand the instructions
helpText.value: The subdomain of your Highrise account (if your Highrise URL is YOURDOMAIN.highrisehq.com, just enter YOURDOMAIN).

label.title: Question for the admin when installing the app on wether or not he wants to use SSL

description.title: Description of the app
description.value: Highrise profiles in tickets, with sync and search

add_to_highrise.title: Button to add a zendesk user to highrise when the user isn't found in highrise first
add_to_highrise.value: Add this Zendesk Support user to Highrise

not_found.title: standard message when there is no contact
not_found.value: No contact found with this email address

problem.title: error message what follows is the error message from the api for example 'email incorrect'

error.title: error message what follows is the error message from the api for example 'email incorrect'

submitting.title: Wait text when the submit button has been pressed

add_to.title: the name variable here will be replaced with a customer name, for example add a note to Bob

added.title: Success message when note is added

empty.title: Message inside the note box when note box is empty
